oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lithograph of Andrew Johnson taken from a painting by Alonzo Chappel
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Steel engraving of President Andrew Johnson, from a painting by Alonzo Chappel, "Likeness from a recent Photograph from life."

Alonzo Chappel (1828-1887), Brooklyn, New York, was a renowned artist of the mid-1850s who produced works of historical events and individuals which were used to illustrate historical texts of the age.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Chappel, Alonzo (1828-1875)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Johnson, Andrew, 1808-1875; Chappel, Alonzo, 1828-1887
Presidents; Steel engravings
